name: Money Handling Pattern
description: CRITICAL: Decimal-based currency handling that REJECTS float entirely. Prevents precision errors in financial calculations. Includes Money class, arithmetic operations, formatting, and validation.
example_usage:
from library.patterns.money_handling import Money, FloatNotAllowedError
m = Money(Decimal('19.99'), 'USD')  # OK
m = Money(19.99)  # RAISES FloatNotAllowedError
